extracted_text: [7] May be decreased to 13,300 sf per unit for voluntary compliance with Section 6.2.3, Single-Family Residential Design Guidelines.
llm_output.rationale: The R-20 district dimensional requirements table on page 154 specifies the minimum lot area for single-family detached homes as 20,000 sq ft. Note [7] on page 155 indicates this can be reduced to 13,300 sq ft under certain conditions. Since we're looking for the minimum lot size for single-family homes, both values are relevant.
llm_output.answer: 20,000 sq ft (may be reduced to 13,300 sq ft with voluntary compliance)
